lead_paragraph: The city’s Department of Housing Preservation and Development will use $32 million from its budget to resolve a crisis that put thousands of families in jeopardy.

keywords.value: Department of Housing Preservation and Development
keywords.name: organizations

headline.seo: Deal Saves Public Housing Subsidies in New York
